connectorUiConfig.title: cveBuster Vulnerability Scanner (Push)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [cveBuster](https://yourcompany.com/cvebuster) connector provides the capability to push vulnerability scan data directly from your cveBuster scanner into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF) Push pattern. This connector ingests CVE details, CVSS scores, patch availability, exploit intelligence, and asset information into a custom Log Analytics table for analysis, alerting, and visualization.

sampleQueries.query:
cveBusterVulnerabilities_CL
 | where Severity == 'Critical' and ExploitAvailable == true
 | sort by CVSS desc

dataTypes.name: cveBusterVulnerabilities_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
cveBusterVulnerabilities_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
cveBusterVulnerabilities_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

customs.name: Microsoft Entra
customs.description: Permission to create an app registration in Microsoft Entra ID. Typically requires Entra ID Application Developer role or higher.

customs.name: Microsoft Azure
customs.description: Permission to assign Monitoring Metrics Publisher role on data collection rule (DCR). Typically requires Azure RBAC Owner or User Access Administrator role

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: This connector enables your cveBuster vulnerability scanner to push data directly to Microsoft Sentinel via the Azure Monitor Ingestion API.

parameters.content:
#### Automated Configuration and Secure Data Ingestion with Entra Application 
Clicking on "Deploy" will trigger the creation of a Log Analytics table and a Data Collection Rule (DCR). 
It will then create an Entra application, link the DCR to it, and set the entered secret in the application. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using an Entra token.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure Your cveBuster Scanner
instructionSteps.description: Use the following parameters to configure your cveBuster scanner to push logs to the workspace.

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Application ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Application ID

parameters.label: Entra App Registration Secret
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the App Registration Secret

parameters.label: Data Collection Endpoint Uri
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Endpoint Uri

parameters.label: Data Collection Rule Immutable ID
parameters.placeholder: Deploy push connector to get the Data Collection Rule Immutable ID

parameters.content:
#### Configure cveBuster Scanner
Update your cveBuster scanner configuration file with the above credentials to enable data push to Microsoft Sentinel.

Example configuration:
```json
{
  "azure": {
    "tenant_id": "<Tenant ID>",
    "client_id": "<Application ID>",
    "client_secret": "<Application Secret>",
    "dce_endpoint": "<Data Collection Endpoint Uri>",
    "dcr_immutable_id": "<Data Collection Rule Immutable ID>",
    "stream_name": "Custom-cveBusterVulnerabilities"
  }
}
```
